About.title: ABOUT
About.t1:
Hello, my name is Daniela although I sign as Dayun.
I’m an artist and illustrator based in Mexico City.
I’m obsessed with intuition, freedom and pleasure.
I hope my work will invite you to live your most free and joyful self.
